metadata.synopsis: The dead drow wizard had a book that was covered by a spell, hiding that this is the Manual of the Adamantine Forge. Now the spell effect was removed or suppressed (by a Sussur Tree flower effect or by dispel magic etc.), the party comments on the tranformation. The party is probably already aware that the book was special (or even know that it was under a spell effect).
